BiblioData.Title: SURFACE LIGHT EMITTING LASER ELEMENT, SURFACE LIGHT EMITTING LASER ARRAY PROVIDED WITH IT, ELECTRO- PHOTOGRAPHIC SYSTEM AND OPTICAL COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
BiblioData.Abstract: A surface-cmission laser device comprises an active layer, cavity spacer layers provided at both sides of the active layer, reflection layers provided at respective sides of the cavity spacer layers, the reflection layers reflecting an oscillation light oscillated in the active layer and a selective oxidation layer. The selective oxidation layer is provided between a location in the reflection layer corresponding to a fourth period node of the standing wave distribution of the electric field of the oscillating light and a location in the reflection layer adjacent to the foregoing fourth period node in the direction away from the active layer and corresponding to an anti-node of the standing wave distribution of the electric field of the oscillation light.

Claims.P: 1. A surface-emission laser device, comprising:
an active layer;
cavity spacer layers provided at both sides of said active layer;
reflection layers provided at respective sides of said cavity spacer layers, said reflection layers reflecting an oscillation light oscillated in said active layer; and

a selective oxidation layer provided between a first location and a second location, said first location being formed in said reflection layer corresponding to a node of a standing wave distribution of an electric field of said oscillation light and a second location adjacent to said first location corresponding to said node of said standing wave distribution in said reflection layer in a direction away from said active layer, said second location corresponding to an anti-node of said standing wave distribution.
2. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 1, wherein said selective oxidation layer is provided between said first location and a midpoint between said first and second locations.
3. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 1, wherein said selective oxidation layer is provided generally at a midpoint between said first location and said second location.
4. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 1,

wherein said reflection layer has a structure in which a first layer having a first refractive index and a second layer having a second refractive index larger than the fist refractive index are laminated alternately,
said elective-oxidation layer being formed in said first layer.
5. A surface-emission laser device, comprising:
an active layer; cavity spacer layers provided at both sides of said active layer;
reflection layers provided at respective sides of said cavity spacer layers, said reflection layers reflecting an oscillating light oscillated in said active layer;

a current confinement layer restricting a region of said reflection layer when injecting a current into said active layer; and a suppression layer suppressing higher-order mode components oscillated in said active layer.
6. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 5, wherein
said current confinement layer and said suppression layer are provided in said reflection layer,
a distance between said active layer and said suppression layer is equal to a distance between said active layer and said current confinement layer.
7. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 5, wherein

said suppression layer comprises a first selective oxidation layer provided between a first location in said reflector layer corresponding to a node of a standing wave distribution formed by an electric field of said oscillation light and a second location in said reflection layer adjacent to said first location in a direction away from said active layer, said first location corresponding to said node of the standing wave distribution, said second location corresponding to an anti-node of said standing wave distribution,
said current confinement layer comprises a second selective oxidation layer different from said first selective oxidation layer,
a distance between said active layer and said first selective oxidation layer is larger than a distance between said active layer and said second selective oxidation layer.

8. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 7, wherein said second selective oxidation layer is provided at a location corresponding to a node of said standing wave distribution of said electric field of oscillation light.
9. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 7, wherein

said reflection layer comprises a first reflection layer of an n-type semiconductor disposed at a first side of said active layer and a second reflection layer disposed at an opposite side with regard to said active layer, said second layer comprising a p-type semiconductor,
said first selective oxidation layer being disposed in said first reflection layer, said second selective oxidation layer being disposed in the second reflection layer.
10. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 5,

further comprising a semiconductor layer provided between said suppression layer and said current confinement layer, said semiconductor layer being configured to inject said current into said active layer,

said suppression layer comprises a first selective oxidation layer provided between a first location in said reflector layer corresponding to a node of a standing wave distribution formed by an electric field of said oscillation light and a second location in said reflection layer adjacent to said first location in a direction away from said active layer, said first location corresponding to said node of the standing wave distribution, said second location corresponding to an anti-node of said standing wave distribution,
said current confinement layer comprising a second selective oxidation layer different from said first selective oxidation layer,
said first and second selective oxidation layers being provided further away from said substrate with regard to said active layer,
said second selective oxidation layer injecting a current from said semiconductor layer into said active layer with confinement,
a distance between said active layer and said first selective oxidation layer being larger than a distance between said active layer and said second selective oxidation layer.

11. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 9, wherein an area of said non-oxidized region of said second selective oxidation layer is larger than an area of said non-oxidized region of said first selective oxidation layer.
12. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 5,

wherein said suppression layer comprises a selective oxidation layer provided between a first location in said reflector layer corresponding to a node of a standing wave distribution formed by an electric field of said oscillation light and a second location in said reflection layer adjacent to said first location in a direction away from said active layer, said first location corresponding to said node of the standing wave distribution, said second location corresponding to an anti-node of said standing wave distribution,

said current confinement layer comprising a high-resistance region subjected to an ion implantation process and having a resistance higher than resistance of a region through which a current injected into said active layer flows,
a distance between said active layer and said suppression layer being larger than a distance between said active layer and said current confinement layer.
13. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 5,

wherein said reflection layer comprises a first reflection layer of a semiconductor provided at a side away from said substrate with respect to said active layer and a second reflection layer of a dielectric provided over said first reflection layer,
said selective oxidation layer being formed in said first layer,

said suppression layer comprising a dielectric layer provided between a first location in said second reflector layer corresponding to a node of a standing wave distribution formed by an electric field of said oscillation light and a second location in said second reflection layer adjacent to said first location in a direction away from said active layer, said first location corresponding to the node of said standing wave distribution, sad second location corresponding to an anti-node of said standing wave distribution, said dielectric layer having a refractive index different from a dielectric adjacent in a lamination direction of said second reflection layer.
14. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 13, further comprising a positive-side electrode,
said current confinement layer comprising a non-oxidized region and an oxidized region provided around said non-oxidized region in an in-plane direction of said substrate,
said positive side electrode being provided on a surface of a contact layer provided over said first reflection layer at a location corresponding to said oxidized region.
15. A surface-emission laser device operable in a single fundamental mode, comprising:
an active layer;
cavity spacer layers provided at both sides of said active layer;
reflection layers provided at respective sides of said cavity spacer layer, said reflection layers reflecting an oscillation light oscillated in said active layer;
a selective oxidation layer provided in said reflection layer and comprising an oxidized region and a non-oxidized region,
said non-oxidized region has an area in a range of 4 - 20 m<2> .
16. The surface-emission laser device as claimed in claim 15, wherein said non-oxidized region has an area in a range of 4 - 18.5 m<2> .
17. A surface-emission laser array comprising a substrate and a plurality of surface-emission laser devices formed on said substrate,
said plurality of surface-emission laser devices comprising:
an active layer;
cavity spacer layers provided at both sides of said active layer;
reflection layers provided at respective sides of said cavity spacer layer, said reflection layers reflecting an oscillation light oscillated in said active layer;

a selective oxidation layer provided between a first location in said reflector layer corresponding to a node of a standing wave distribution formed by an electric field of said oscillation light and a second location in said reflection layer adjacent to said first location in a direction away from said active layer, said first location corresponding to said node of the standing wave distribution, said second location corresponding to an anti-node of said standing wave distribution.
18. An electrophotographic system, comprising:
a photosensitive drum;
a writing optical source forming a laser light; and
an optical scanning system forming a shaped beam from said laser light and forming an electrostatic image on said photosensitive drum by said shaped beam,
a synchronization control circuit controlling said photosensitive drum, said wiring optical source and said optical scanning system,
said writing optical source comprising:
an active layer;
cavity spacer layers provided at both sides of said active layer;
reflection layers provided at respective sides of said cavity spacer layer, said reflection layers reflecting an oscillation light oscillated in said active layer;

a selective oxidation layer provided between a first location in said reflector layer corresponding to a node of a standing wave distribution formed by an electric field of said oscillation light and a second location in said reflection layer adjacent to said first location in a direction away from said active layer, said first location corresponding to said node of the standing wave distribution, said second location corresponding to an anti-node of said standing wave distribution.
19. An optical communicating system, comprising:
a laser array module comprising a plurality of laser devices driven by a driver circuit;
a photodiode array module comprising a plurality of photodiodes respectively coupled to corresponding laser devices in said laser array module by an optical fiber; and
a signal detection circuit detecting qa reception signals of said photodiodes in said photodiode array module, where each of said plurality of laser devices comprising:
an active layer;
cavity spacer layers provided at both sides of said active layer;
reflection layers provided at respective sides of said cavity spacer layer, said reflection layers reflecting an oscillation light oscillated in said active layer;

a selective oxidation layer provided between a first location in said reflector layer corresponding to a node of a standing wave distribution formed by an electric field of said oscillation light and a second location in said reflection layer adjacent to said first location in a direction away from said active layer, said first location corresponding to said node of the standing wave distribution, said second location corresponding to an anti-node of said standing wave distribution.
